meanings.definition: A type of bird with colorful plumage and a distinctive crest.
meanings.sent1: The touracos in the forest have bright feathers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of touracos flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The touracos decided to have a fashion show with their colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: The touracos stood out in the trees like living rainbows.
meanings.sent5: Children love to draw touracos because of their vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Plural form of touraco, referring to multiple birds of this species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the touracos perched on the branches.
meanings.sent2: The touracos chirped happily as they searched for food.
meanings.sent3: The touracos formed a choir and sang songs together.
meanings.sent4: The touracos filled the sky with a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: Touracos are a common sight in this part of the forest.
